name: Memrise Japanese - Learning Kanji with SJGL
description:
This style is part of bigger PROJECT

Check more: https://github.com/superpawko/Memrise_Dynamic_Font__with_Koohi

IMPORTANT: Get font "Yu Gothic UI".
Get Kanji STROKE ORDER font from http://www.nihilist.org.uk/

It is not END product. But it does job done.
For now everyting was tested only in CHROME browser.

I know only some basic of CSS or even less. But i was able to fix some bugs of other CSS for Japanese. I will fix and update this CSS in future.

If you find something you don't like i will try to fix it. ASAP
